name: Derrick Dale FONTROY, I, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Sheila WOODS-SKIPPER, Respondent

parties: Derrick Dale FONTROY, I, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Sheila WOODS-SKIPPER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of November, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and Extraordinary Relief is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1053
Derrick Dale FONTROY, I, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Sheila WOODS-SKIPPER, Respondent.
No. 157 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 8, 2012.
